member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.AvailableRegionsController.Get
member.summary: Returns all country codes that have values in all tables. This is especially useful for visualization ;^)
member.returns: An array of strings representing countries

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.SpotifyController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all trending songs for a region on a specific day.
member.param: OPTIONAL Max amounts of songs to return

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.SpotifyController.Delete(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Region the song was trending in.
member.returns: The song you deleted or 409 when that value does not exist.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.SpotifyController.Put(DatabaseHelper.Models.SpotifyTrendingSong)
member.summary: Updates a song in the database.
member.returns: Returns the old song object on success.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.SpotifyController.Post(DatabaseHelper.Models.SpotifyTrendingSong)
member.summary: Posts a new song to the database if no song with that position/date/ragion combo exists yet. Else returns 409.
member.returns: Returns the new song on success.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.TerrorismController.Get(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all terrorism events in a specific region in a specific year.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.TerrorismController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an event from the Database.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.TerrorismController.Put(DatabaseHelper.Models.TerrorismEvent)
member.summary: Updates an event in the database.
member.returns: The old version of your updated event.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.TerrorismController.Post(DatabaseHelper.Models.TerrorismEvent)
member.summary: Adds a new event to the database.
member.param: The new event you want to add.

member.name: M:DataprocessingApi.Controllers.YoutubeController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all top videos for a specific region on a specific date.
member.param: Region to return top songs for.
OPTIONAL Max amount of songs to return.
